creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
The DOAP file at 
http://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/santuario/trunk/doap_XML_Security_Java.rdf
still refers to XML Security and the old website URLs.

Fixed. Please verify and mark this issue as closed.

Colm.
creator: coheigea@apache.org
sebb@apache.org
text:
Thanks. Looks good, except for the following:

"Releases can be downloaded from http://santuario.apache.org/dist"

This should be changed to refer to the proper download page.

Also, what about the C++ implementation? It does not get a mention.

> This should be changed to refer to the proper download page.

Fixed.

> Also, what about the C++ implementation? It does not get a mention.

Fixed. I renamed rdf to the following:

https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/santuario/trunk/doap_Santuario.rdf

Colm.
creator: coheigea@apache.org
